about: AI Automation Engineer specialized in developing intelligent agents and autonomous workflows. Proven track record implementing AI solutions that process 1,000+ monthly interactions and generate €20,000+ annual savings. Expert in LLM integration, MCP development, and no-code/low-code platforms. Founded Brotea to democratize AI automation tools, creating scalable systems that transform business operations through intelligent decision-making and seamless integrations.

keyProjects.title: Multi-Agent Restaurant Management System
keyProjects.description: Developed autonomous agent ecosystem handling reservations, customer service, and inventory management. Integrated LangChain with custom MCPs for real-time decision making and cross-platform communication.

keyProjects.title: Intelligent Workflow Orchestrator
keyProjects.description: Built AI-powered automation platform using N8N and custom agents for complex business process automation. Features dynamic workflow adaptation based on context and performance metrics.

keyProjects.title: Educational AI Assistant Network
keyProjects.description: Created distributed agent system for student mentoring and curriculum optimization. Leverages vector databases and semantic search for personalized learning experiences.

experience.title: Founder & AI Automation Architect
achievements: Architected AI-first development platform with autonomous code generation and testing capabilities
Developed MCP servers for seamless integration between AI agents and development tools
Created training programs enabling 50+ students to build production-ready AI automation systems
Established partnerships with 5 educational organizations for AI literacy initiatives
Built open-source tools improving development productivity by 40% through intelligent automation

experience.title: AI Automation Consultant
achievements: Deployed intelligent agent ecosystem automating booking, customer service, and inventory management
Implemented LangChain-powered chatbot with context awareness handling 1,000+ monthly queries
Built custom MCPs enabling seamless communication between AI agents and restaurant systems
Developed Zapier/Make integrations with AI decision layers generating €20,000 annual cost savings

experience.title: Full Stack Developer & Automation Specialist
achievements: Developed Flutter applications with AI-powered features reaching 10,000+ downloads
